name: F1-Dodge (C64)
description:
A Game for TheC64Maxi/C64Mini/Commodore 64 or a Good C64 Emulator.

1 Player Arcade Style "Dodge" em up Game.

Drive your F1 Car along the Track and avoid Hazards and Other F1 Cars, Pick up Spanners and Gas Cans for Bonus Points and to get on the Hi-Score table.

Made with Shoot 'Em' Up Construction Kit by Sensible Software and Side Scroll Version by Jon Wells, Seuck framework Code and Music by Richard Bayliss.
